programme.title: Robocar POLI
programme.sub-title: Let's Follow The Rules & You Can Do It, Mr. Builder
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - One day, Cab, Posty, and Lifty who encountered each other at the emergency charging station ends up setting the station on a fire while fighting over who charges first. Rescue team is on their way to put out this fire!

programme.title: Robocar POLI
programme.sub-title: Cleany Gets Angry & Max Gets a Fish
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - One day, Spooky realizes that Cleany never gets upset. Feeling odd, Spooky tries to make Cleany angry and starts to do various pranks on Cleany.

programme.title: Robocar POLI
programme.sub-title: The Hottest day in Brooms Town & Ms. Belle's Medal
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - Terrible heat wave comes to Brooms Town! Rescue team warns their friends in town to avoid going out in the sun to prevent sunstroke.

programme.title: Robocar POLI
programme.sub-title: Who Is Taller & Amber's Training
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - Titan and Terry carry the construction materials at the station construction site. Seeing them, Bruner praises Titan for being taller than Terry.

programme.sub-title: Episode 5

programme.sub-title: A Suspicious Friend & It's Good to Tidy Up
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - Could rescue team be able to rescue Tracky who is in great danger of being crushed by the broken dame any minute now?

programme.title: Robocar POLI
programme.sub-title: I’m Going to Do Whatever I Want & Helly’s Wish
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - BRUNY never gets satisfied no matter how many toys he has. AMBER introduces MINI, BENNY, RODY trio to BRUNY after she learns that BRUNY is bored.

programme.title: Robocar POLI
programme.sub-title: We Look Alike & Marine's Dream
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - One day, Mr. Builder visits Mr. Wheeler's store and gets wet while he is helping Mr. Wheeler fix the sink.

programme.title: Robocar POLI
programme.sub-title: The Unpoppable Bubble & A Spring Cleaning Disaste
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - One day on the road, MICKY hears MINI, BENNY, RODY trio's talking "We do not want to get close to MICKY because we are afraid of him." MICKY consults to AMBER.

programme.sub-title: Halloween Glow coloring

programme.title: Robocar POLI
programme.sub-title: Where's Bruny? & The Fortune Cookie
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - On busy day, BRUNY visits BRUNER working in construction site. BRUNER, too busy to take care of BRUNY, asks MAX to take care of BRUNY.

programme.title: Robocar POLI
programme.sub-title: Tracky's Special Invitation & I Want to Go to Sea
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - SCHOOL B promised to go outdoor activity with children. But he is worried because he cannot figure out any plan.

programme.title: Robocar POLI
programme.sub-title: Move out! Battle in the Woods Part 1& Part2
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - One day in Brooms Town, Helly finds a trap in the wild animal safe zone. Detecting something strange might happen, rescue team members start to look across the forest.

programme.title: Robocar POLI
programme.sub-title: Please Accept My Apology & Bruner's Birthday Secret
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - One day, MAX goes to port to do Mr. Builder's errand. After finishing his job, MAX plays hide and seek with RIFTY.

programme.title: Robocar POLI
programme.sub-title: Miracle at Tracky's Farm & Boom! Crash! Danger!
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - One day, when severe drought continues in Brooms town. TRACKY finds there is no water remain in the farm’s water tank. This is because of no rain drop for a long time.

programme.sub-title: Traffic Safety with POLI
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - Jaywalking is dangerous | How to cross the street safely | School bus safety | Streetwise

programme.sub-title: Traffic Safety with POLI
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - Look out for blind spots! | Rainy day dangers | Rules of the road | Play ball safely

programme.title: Robocar POLI
programme.sub-title: Camp's Secret Plan & Fishing Commotion
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - CAMP arrives Brooms town harbor one day earlier than planned! CAMP asks friends in harbor not to tell the others that CAMP is in Brooms town because he wants to see how much the friends in town welcome him.

programme.title: Robocar POLI
programme.sub-title: Thank you, Roy & Disappearance of Spooky
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - ROY is busy when there is electricity inspection in Brooms town. On the other hand, POLI urgently requests help to ROY while he is cleaning up the falling rocks.

programme.title: Robocar POLI
programme.sub-title: Helping Each Other When Things are Difficult & Tracky's Present
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - One day morning, Mr. Builder asks DUMP and BRUNER to go to harbor and bring the box filled with sand bags and nails. However, BRUNER complains that carrying is not his job even though DUMP asks him to help.

programme.title: Robocar POLI
programme.sub-title: The Brooms Town Railroad Station & Our Fabulous New Friend
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - BRUNER and DUMP fall into water. How Brooms town friends settle this complex situation?

programme.desc: Robocar POLI Opening Song / Brave Rescue Team Song / School Bus Safety Song / The Cleany‘s Cleaning Song / Car Family / Go! Go! Construction Team

programme.sub-title: The Invitation & Spooky Plays Sick
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - One fine morning, Spooky runs into Cleany and finds out that all the friends in town have received an invitation from Cab for his party. Spooky gets excited to receive an invitation from Cab but somehow the invitation card never came to Spooky.
